title: Chole Masala
description: Spicy chickpeas cooked in a rich onion-tomato gravy.
fullRecipe:
1. Boil soaked chickpeas.
2. Sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
3. Add boiled chickpeas and cook for 10 mins.
4. Garnish with coriander and serve with bhature or rice.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Creamy tomato-based curry with soft paneer cubes.
fullRecipe:
1. Sauté onion-tomato mix with spices and blend.
2. Cook the puree in butter and cream.
3. Add paneer cubes and simmer.
4. Serve hot with naan or paratha.

title: Aloo Gobi
description: Dry sabzi made with potatoes and cauliflower.
fullRecipe:
1. Sauté cumin seeds and onion.
2. Add chopped potatoes and gobi.
3. Cook with turmeric, chili powder and salt.
4. Cover and steam till soft.
5. Garnish with coriander.

title: Masoor Dal
description: Simple red lentil curry spiced with garlic and cumin.
fullRecipe:
1. Boil dal with turmeric.
2. Prepare tadka with cumin and garlic.
3. Mix tadka into dal and simmer.
4. Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Palak Paneer
description: Spinach curry with soft cubes of paneer.
fullRecipe:
1. Blanch spinach and puree.
2. Sauté onion and garlic.
3. Add puree and cook with spices.
4. Add paneer and simmer.
5. Serve with naan.

title: Bhindi Masala
description: Spicy okra cooked with onions and tomatoes.
fullRecipe:
1. Chop bhindi and sauté in oil till non-sticky.
2. Add onions and tomatoes.
3. Cook with spices.
4. Serve with roti or paratha.

title: Kadhi Pakora
description: Gram flour curry with deep-fried pakoras.
fullRecipe:
1. Prepare curd-besan mixture.
2. Cook with tadka of mustard seeds and spices.
3. Fry pakoras and add into kadhi.
4. Simmer and serve with rice.

title: Jeera Rice
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with cumin seeds.
fullRecipe:
1. Sauté cumin seeds in ghee.
2. Add soaked rice and water.
3. Cook till rice is fluffy.
4. Serve with dal or curry.

title: Rajma
description: Kidney beans curry cooked in spicy tomato gravy.
fullRecipe:
1. Soak and boil rajma.
2. Make onion-tomato masala.
3. Add boiled rajma and simmer.
4. Serve with rice.

title: Tawa Paneer
description: Spicy paneer cubes cooked on tawa with capsicum and onions.
fullRecipe:
1. Heat oil on tawa, sauté onion, peas and capsicum.
2. Add paneer and tawa masala.
3. Cook on high flame.
4. Serve hot.

title: Mix Veg Curry
description: Delicious curry made with assorted vegetables.
fullRecipe:
1. Sauté onion-tomato masala.
2. Add chopped veggies.
3. Add water and cook till soft.
4. Finish with cream if desired.

title: Baingan Bharta
description: Smoky mashed brinjal mixed with onions and spices.
fullRecipe:
1. Roast brinjal and peel skin.
2. Mash and mix with sautéed onions, tomatoes, and spices.
3. Serve with roti.
